Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Transformer regression model for tabular data

Implement TabTransformer approach that treats each feature as a token,
using feature embedding, positional embedding, and Transformer encoder
for regression on the same dataset as the MLP model.

EOF
\)")
